@1@ Default constructor. Creates an empty {{tt|stacktrace_entry}}.

@2@ Copy constructor. Creates a copy of {{tt|other}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | other | another {{tt|stacktrace_entry}} to copy from}}
{{par end}}

===Notes===
A non-empty {{tt|stacktrace_entry}} can be obtained from a {{lc|std::basic_stacktrace}} created by {{lc|std::basic_stacktrace::current}} or a copy of such {{tt|std::basic_stacktrace}}.
